entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
